original_text: They compassed me about also with words of hatred; and fought against me without a cause.
korean_text: 또 미워하는 말로 나를 두르고 까닭 없이 나를 공격하였음이니이다

sentences.original_text: They compassed me about also with words of hatred;
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 나를 미움의 말로 에워쌌으며;

sentences.original_text: and fought against me without a cause.
